lookingFor.value: Solutions that look at a greater picture and work holistically to reach a clear goal
Get to know and empathise with your user
Don't "just" make MVPs make a MLP (Most lovable solution)

bio.value: Currently working as service design lead at FINN.no
Loves people, they can be so weird
